formattedAddress: 1879 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1879 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031-1716, USA

originalText.text: I would highly recommend Mickeys Sunset for anyone who is looking for a compassionate, caring and professional service. Mr Hickman and his staff are all of that. My father was laid to rest and he looked natural as if he were sleeping. They did a fine job and the service was very nice. Beautiful words from the pastor Jay Gooding. Organist and songs from a talented singer were amazing.

Organist and songs from a talented singer were amazing.

originalText.text: Our family will not select this funeral home again in the future. The 2 stars are for the organist, Eric B. Turner whose soulful, spiritual, dynamic voice and songs made the funeral service comforting and bearable for our family. Mr. Raymond, the owner did a poor, unaesthetic job on our beloved mom's face - she did not look like our mom! He did "ALL" the funeral preparations work himself to retain the bulk of the revenue, and in doing so, it led to "inaccuracies and blunders" in the preparation of our beloved mom for the funeral service, and due to the timing of the service, we were not able to select another company. He must hire additional people to assist him in the funeral preparation service so that at a time when a family is in distress over their loved one, the funeral service can flow flawlessly and without this adding additional stress and duress on the family.

originalText.text:
My sister lost her son on October 17, 2022. As this was a sudden passing; it was certainly a devastating loss for she and our entire family. I assumed the responsibility of preparing funeral arrangements for my nephew, sight unseen, because I reside in North Carolina.

Our family did not know what to expect from the services of Mickey’s Sunset but Mr. Rodney Gibbs came highly recommended.

All communication between Mr. Gibbs and I were via-phone/text and emails.  Mr. Gibbs was professional, polite, pleasant and extremely patient.  He is the consummate mortician!

On the day of the private family viewing, we were met with a very fine representation of our loved one.  As a family, we walked away from the funeral services delivered by Mickey’s Sunset Funeral home; feeling heartbroken but extremely satisfied!

My nephew looked absolutely AMAZING!!!
He looked just as handsome, as he did in life, while lying in his final resting bed.

As an entire family, we were proud to let the world have their own turn to view the AWESOME work performed by the staff at Mickey’s Sunset Funeral Home. We thank you, Mr. Gibbs, for your impeccable service!

We highly recommend their services.

originalText.text: I've had a few family members here and they sent them away very beautiful and it's something that we just can't Forget and as we get older this is flat level it's clean and I'm sorry for anyone that doesn't feel the same this is a beautiful place to lay a loved one and Say Goodbye.

originalText.text:
Mr. Rodney Gibbs and the staff at Mickeys were very patient with us as well as compassionate. My dad had been deceased over a month before we had the funeral, but they made him look like he was asleep and he looked like himself. I would highly recommend them and whenever the time comes that we must go down this road again, we will be utilizing their services.

Sincerely,
The Family of Russell Clark Sr.
